node.title: Person stabbed at Wellington hotel, witnesses sought
node.description: A 30-year-old man has been charged following a stabbing at Hotel Waterloo on Bunny Street in Wellington last night.
node.content: ["A 30-year-old man has been charged following a stabbing at Hotel Waterloo on Bunny Street in Wellington last night.", "Police were alerted to a person who had been seriously assaulted at the hotel and received multiple stab wounds at around 9:50pm.", "The victim was transported to Wellington Hospital in a critical condition where they remain. The offender was arrested at the scene.", "They appeared in the Wellington District Court this morning charged with wounds with intent to cause grievous bodily harm.", "\"This was a very serious attack that resulted in the victim sustaining horrific injuries,\" police said in a statement.", "Police have spoken to a number of witnesses but would like to hear from anyone who may have information that can assist their investigation.", "Anyone who has information is asked to contact Police on 105 quoting file number 220226/9847.", "Information can also be passed on anonymously via Crime Stoppers on 0800 555 111."]
